title: Amalgam releases Ferrari 12cilidri
description: Ferrari’s new 12Cilindri is a nod to the iconic V12 Ferraris of the past, as its name implies. The car's long hood and short rear are reminiscent of classic grand touring models like the 275 and Daytona, blending retro aesthetics with contemporary performance and technology. Under the hood is Ferrari’s F140 V12, the same engine we saw in the 812 Competizione. A total of 819 hp and 500 lb-ft of torque is delivered through an 8-speed Magna PT dual-clutch transmission. Ferrari claims the 12Cilindri does 0-62 mph in 2.9 seconds with a top speed of 211 mph. A blend of cutting-edge technology & refined design: Ferrari 12cilidri Continue...
